price: Kõ kun amincẽ cewa wanda ke cikin sama bã zai iya sako muku iskar gũguwa ba? To, zã ku san yadda (ãƙibar) gargaɗi Na take.
arabic: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am amintum man fī al-samāi an yur'sila ʿalaykum ḥāṣiban fasataʿlamūna kayfa nadhīri
